description: This recipe appeared in an article in The Times by Marian Burros.
title: 1987: Coconut Daiquiris
title_page: 1987: Coconut Daiquiris - The New York Times
text:
This recipe appeared in an article in The Times by Marian Burros. The drink came from David Margolis, a friend of Mayor Ed Kochâ€™s.
1/2 very ripe pineapple, cut into chunks
Juice of 1 lime
2 tablespoons Coco Lopez cream of coconut
71/2 ounces Bacardi light rum
20 ice cubes.
Combine the ingredients in a blender and whiz until smooth. Serve immediately without garnishes. Makes about 5 daiquiris.
